Great little place near Pl. Catalunya.  Took a chance on Taller on a Friday afternoon when city was hopping.  All the standards, jamon, queso, bravas,  pan tomato were very good.  But 3 dishes stood out; the fried aubergine and hearts of artichokes and pimientos Padron were outstanding.  The aubergine was sliced thin as a euro coin, had a light batter, and was dressed with honey and lime.  The artichoke hearts were sliced even thinner and flash fried to perfection.  Price was in line with the quality.
